thread.title: Energy and financials set to lead Dow's tumble at open
thread.title_full: Energy and financials set to lead Dow's tumble at open - MarketWatch

author: Mark DeCambre
title: Energy and financials set to lead Dow's tumble at open
text: Goldman Sachs, Chevron Corp., J.P. Morgan Chase and Exxon were among the components set to lead the Dow Jones Industrial Average lower Tuesday in what's setting up as a sharp fall at the opening bell. Chevron CVX, -3.68% is off 2.7% and J.P. Morgan JPM, -3.19% was nearly 3% lower in pre-market trade. Meanwhile, Visa Inc. V, -1.65% was down 2.5% and Goldman's GS, -2.59% shares were 2.8% lower in premarket. Stock-index futures for the Dow YMU5, -2.01% are down nearly 400 points and point to turbulent start to September trading for stocks. Futures for the S&P 500 ESU5, -1.97% were down 49 points and those for the Nasdaq NQU5, -1.53% were off 111 points.
